title: Population age structure in metropolitan areas in the U.S .
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Areas on X-axis for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of residents.

Out of all 5 groups, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 75 years and over had the maximum Number of residents and it saw the lowest in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA out of all 10 Areas.

There is a gap of 998218.0 between the highest and lowest Number of residents found for 75 years and over in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of residents on the Y-axis for 10 different Areas for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 5 groups, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Areas on X-axis for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of residents.

Out of all 5 groups, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

In Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, 75 years and over had the maximum Number of residents and it saw the lowest in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA out of all 10 Areas.

There is a gap of 998218.0 between the highest and lowest Number of residents found for 75 years and over in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 10 different Areas on X-axis for 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of residents.

Out of all 5 groups, 18 to 44 years had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and 75 years and over had the lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

Among all the Areas, 75 years and over had the highest Number of residents in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and lowest Number of residents in Area Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA and Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA had the biggest gap of 998218.0 between the highest and lowest Number of residents found for 75 years and over.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Number of residents was found in case of 18 to 44 years.

18 to 44 years had the maximum Number of residents out of all 5 groups in Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA followed by 18 to 44 years in New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA, and the minimum Number of residents is found for 75 years and over in Atlanta - Sandy Springs - Marietta GA.

Averaging all 5 groups Under 18 years, 18 to 44 years, 45 to 64 years, 65 to 74 years, and 75 years and over, the Area New York - Northern New Jersey - Long Island NY-NJ-PA is the maximum Number of residents and Boston - Cambridge - Quincy MA-NH is the minimum Number of residents.
